description: A directory of shadcn-compatible registries that can be added to components.json

name.description: The registry namespace. Must start with @ and follow the pattern @[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-_]*

homepage.description: The URL to the registry homepage where users can browse the registry

url.description: The registry URL template. Must include the {name} placeholder that will be replaced with the registry item name

description.description: A brief description of the registry and what type of components or code it distributes

logo.description: The SVG logo for the registry as an HTML string
